alert.note: Alert for Panola; Rusk; Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 2:27AM CST until January 03 at 3:15AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Panola County in northeastern Texas... Southeastern Rusk County in northeastern Texas... Northwestern Shelby County in eastern Texas... * Until 315 AM CST. * At 226 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Minden, or 19 miles south of Henderson, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carthage, Tenaha, Timpson, Minden, Mount Enterprise, Gary City, Dotson, Woods and Lawsonville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CST for eastern and northeastern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CST for eastern and northeastern Texas.
